com.oracle.email.exttab

Class UserFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.email.exttab.UserFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    oracle.kv.exttab.TableFormatter

    public class UserFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements oracle.kv.exttab.TableFormatter
    This class is used to format the User table row that has 'name' as the nested field: {"first":"foo","middle":"","last":"bar"} and because of the nested field we need to write our own custom formatter. For other tables like user.folder or sequence etc we can use out of the box formatter as they have simple data types only.
